model.description: This is the model for workflow encoding, version 2.0 The major change of this version is the roles that are now stored in workflow and disappear from process model

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.FlexoModelObject

property.name: userIdentifier
property.description: Unique ID of the user (used for team synchronization)

property.name: flexoID
property.description: Unique ID generated and maintained by Flexo

property.name: dontGenerate
property.description: Check this box, if you don't want this node to generate documentation

property.name: description
property.description: Defines widget name

property.name: hasSpecificDescriptions
property.description: Wheter the specific descriptions should be used in the generated documentation or not

property.name: specificDescriptions
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains a name of a DocType as a key, and a description specific to that DocType as the value

property.name: dynamicProperties
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains dynamic properties (data that are not handled by application, but need to be stored in the context of back compatibility)

entity.description: Root class for all objects of Flexo

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ontology.EditionPatternReference
entity.description: EditionPattern references in which this object is involved

property.name: isDeletedOnServer
property.description: Unique ID generated and maintained by Flexo

property.name: URIFromSourceObject
property.description: the URI of the object this object was issued from

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.RepresentableFlexoModelObject
entity.description: Contains data used for graphical representations

property.name: graphicalProperties
property.description: Dynamic properties storing data used for graphical representation

property.name: roleList
property.description: List of all roles involved in this workflow

property.name: importedRoleList
property.description: List of all roles imported in this workflow

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.wkf.RoleList
entity.description: Represents all the roles that are accessible in the context of this workflow

property.name: roles
property.description: List of roles that are contained inside this RoleList

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.wkf.Role
entity.description: Represents a role involved in a process. An activity defines one and only one role.

property.name: name
property.description: Name of this role

property.name: isSystemRole
property.description: Is this role a system role ?

property.name: isAssignable
property.description: Is this role a assignable to an activity?

property.name: roleSpecializations
property.description: List of roles this role is specializing

property.name: annotation
property.description: Annotation for this specialization

property.name: parentRole
property.description: parent role

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.wkf.RoleCompound
entity.description: Represents a compound of roles, which consists in a closed subgraph extracted from global roles structure, where some roles can be selected. Using this structure ensure that the obtained graph is closed, complete and consistent (does not contains post-conditions pointing outside the graph). NOTE: this object is not used to store data (in the context of persistence) but for clipboard operations.

property.name: roles
property.description: List of all roles contained in this compound
